title: Calories in Tilapia
meta_description: Discover calories in tilapia per 100g serving, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for easy meal planning.
assumptions: Cooked tilapia fillet (baked or grilled, dry heat), skinless, no added oil, salt, or seasonings; standard farm-raised variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fish size, farming method, cooking technique, and added ingredients. Consult labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cooked tilapia provides about 128 kcal and 26g protein.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts panel for comparison.

faqs.a: Approximately 128 kcal for cooked tilapia per 100g.
Yes, 100g cooked tilapia has about 26g protein.
No, tilapia is carb-free with 0g carbs per 100g.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in tilapia?
faqs.a: Dry heat cooking keeps it low-cal; frying adds 40-100+ kcal from oil.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in tilapia?
faqs.a: Low at 2.7g total fat per 100g, with 0.8g saturated.
